description: Stores student grades for a specific grading period within a Term.

fields.description: The student for whom the grade is being recorded. When left blank, Contact autopopulates from the valid Course Connection on save.
fields.inlineHelpText: The student for whom the grade is being recorded. When left blank, Contact autopopulates from the valid Course Connection on save.
fields.label: Contact

fields.description: The class in which the student received this grade. The Contact and Course Offering on Term Grade must match the Contact and Course Offering on the Course Connection record.
fields.inlineHelpText: The class in which the student received this grade. The Contact and Course Offering on Term Grade must match the Contact and Course Offering on the Course Connection record.
fields.label: Course Connection

fields.description: The Course Offering associated with the grade being recorded. When left blank, Course Offering autopopulates from the valid Course Connection on save.
fields.inlineHelpText: The Course Offering associated with the grade being recorded. When left blank, Course Offering autopopulates from the valid Course Connection on save.
fields.label: Course Offering

fields.description: The number of credits available this Term for this Course.
fields.inlineHelpText: The number of credits attempted for this course and grading period.
fields.label: Credits Attempted

fields.description: The number of credits the student earned this term for this course.
fields.inlineHelpText: The number of credits earned for this course and grading period.
fields.label: Credits Earned

fields.description: If your school uses letter grades, enter the letter grade the student earned, for example, A, B, C, etc.
fields.inlineHelpText: The letter grade the student earned for this course. For example, "A+" or any other text value.
fields.label: Letter Grade

fields.description: If your school uses numeric grades, enter the numeric grade the student earned.
fields.inlineHelpText: The numerical grade the student earned for this course, which can be based on any non-percentage number.
fields.label: Numerical Grade

fields.description: If your school grades on a percentage basis, enter the percentage grade the student earned.
fields.inlineHelpText: The percentage grade the student earned for this course.
fields.label: Percent Grade

fields.description: The result of the student's performance for this grading period.
fields.inlineHelpText: The result of the student's performance for this grading period.
fields.label: Result

fields.description: The type of grading period that this grade is for, for example, Mid-Term Grade, Final Grade, Exam Grade, Grading Period.
fields.inlineHelpText: The type of term or grading period for which this grade is being recorded.
fields.label: Term Grade Type

fields.description: Indicates in which Term the student earned this grade.
fields.inlineHelpText: The term or grading period for which this grade is being recorded.
fields.label: Term

label: Term Grade
